aboutme.headline: About me
aboutme.e2: I am a business information scientist and have over ten years of experience in IT. I work as a software engineer with a focus on React & TypeScript. Additionally, I have a lot of expertise in business management, growth and project management. In all projects, I make sure to always keep the business goal in mind and strive for implementation according to it.
aboutme.e3: I am a fan of sustainable and pragmatic solutions and place great value on good communication between all stakeholders.
aboutme.e4: Personal interests outside of work: cycling, skiing & board games
aboutme.title: Work

aboutmeheike.headline: About me
aboutmeheike.h2: As a passionate web developer with a focus on the frontend, I have a very strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and TypeScript, as well as expertise with modern frontend frameworks such as React. I have experience working with cross-functional teams, including designers and backend developers, to ensure seamless integration of frontend and backend components. I also strive to keep up to date with the latest technologies and best practices, and to constantly improve my skills through continuous learning and experimentation.
aboutmeheike.h3: For me, coding combines the challenge of solving problems on the one hand and creativity in design on the other.
aboutmeheike.h4: Away from work, I like: board games, skiing, hiking, reading manga, and drawing.

projects.brettspielguru2: The website of Brettspielguru should present the products on the one hand, on the other hand provide a possibility to find the exact fitting card sleeves for different board games. In addition, new games with the matching card sleeves can be added independently in the backend.
projects.manga-anime2: A manga and anime portal that displays the currently most popular manga and anime including descriptions and ratings from Myanimelist. Additionally, own collections can be created and managed.
projects.javlis2: Relaunch and further development of Javlis.com, a portal for Decentralized Finance
projects.boardgames2: Project for the overview of the currently most sought-after board games on the market. Furthermore, a board game search was implemented, which outputs an exact board game description incl. number of players, age recommendation and playing time.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.contactText: We are looking forward to exciting projects. If you are looking for React developers for your project, feel free to contact us anytime.
